ee ha sambandha thakshanika danuma ha yatithala pahasukam jathika gamana gamana komishan sabhawa magin sapayanu labe.pasal sisun sandaha kriyathmaka sisu sariya pasal bas sewawa thawa duratath pulul kirima sandaharajaya 2015 wasara wenuwen rupiyal miliyana 100 ka amathara mudalak rajaya laba di athi bawada amathiwaraya pawasiya.kolambaa pawathi palath prawahana amathiwarunge samuluwakadi amathi waraya mema adahas palakaleya.dakunu palath pradhana amathi shan wijayalalda silwa mahatha thama palatha thula eekabaddha kalasatahan sarthakawa kriyathmaka wana bawath, ebawin prawahana kshethraye gatalu awama wi athi bawath, pawasiya.sisu sariya pasal bas ratha sewawa wayambaa palatha thula sarthakawa kriyathmakawa pawathina bawin nawa sisusariya bas sewa aarambha kirimata awasthawa labadeka lesa wayambaa palath prawahana amathi gunadasa dehigama mahatha illa sitiyeya.uthurumada palath prawahana amathi ech.bi. semasinha mahatha adahas dakwamin duragaman sewa basratha nawathum ha aapanashala pilibandawa sahimakata pathwiya nohaki bawin eewa widhimath kirime wadapiliwelak kadinamin diyath kalayuthu bawa pawasiya.gunathmaka magi prawahana sewawak rata thula sthapitha kirima sandaha amathyanshaya wadasatahan rasak kriyathmaka kara athi bawath, eya sarthaka kara ganima sandaha palath margastha magiprawahana adhikarinhi sahaya athyawashya bawath pudgalika prawahana sewa amathyanshaye lekam padmasiri jayamanna mahatha pawasiya.eekabaddha kalasataen kramaya kriyathmaka kirima pilibandawa basnahira ha madhyama palath margastha magiprawahana adhikarin ha shri langama samaga karana lada sakachcha sarthaka bawa mehidi ema palath adhikarinhi sabhapathiwarunpawasuha.gunathmaka magi prawahana sewawak sthapitha dirima sandaha gatha yuthu kriyamarga pilibandawa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha samaga sakachcha kirimata niyamitha athara ehidi ganulabana thirana janadhipathithuma waitha idiripath kirimatada niyamithayamema sakachchawata jathika gamana gamana komishan sabhawe sabhapathi renuka perera mahathada, palath prawahana amathyanshawala lekamwarun palath margastha magi prawahana adhikarinhi sabhapathiwarun ha samanyadhikariwarun, uthuru palath disa lekam karyalayanhi niyojithawarun , pudgalika prawahana sewa amathyanshaye ha jathitha gamana gamana komishan sabhawe niladharihu sahabhagi wuha.
